description: Extracts data from an Epicollect5 project.

input.name: client id
input.description:
The Epicollect5 Client ID to access private projects.
Not required for public projects.
See https://epicollect5.gitbooks.io/epicollect5-api/content/client-credentials-grant/create-client-app.html.

input.name: client secret
input.description:
The Epicollect5 Client Secret to access private projects.
Not required for public projects.
See https://epicollect5.gitbooks.io/epicollect5-api/content/client-credentials-grant/create-client-app.html.

input.name: map index
input.description: The index of the mapping to use. Default: 0
